ui_button_lock.message: Lock to Interact with Apps & Widgets

ui_te_name_desc.message: What do you want to call it?

ui_te_url_desc.message: Enter the URL you'd like to link to, such as http://www.google.com/

ui_te_url_tip.message: Tip: A valid URL contains a protocol - such as "http://" - before the domain. Without a valid protocol, your shortcut will not work.

ui_te_bg_tip.message: Tip: If you check this box, you may also want to hide the name and favicon.

ui_te_bg_note.message: Note: This option has no effect on the Icon & Background settings.

ui_te_app_tip.message: Not all options are available for apps. If you'd like to get more options, create a custom shortcut instead. Simply click on an empty tile with the grid unlocked.

ui_te_ib_desc.message: Enter a web URL to an image, use the browse button, or drag & drop an image above to change the icon.

ui_te_ib_tip.message: Tip: Leave blank for no icon.

ui_te_ib_advanced.message: Advanced: Hide the name and favicon and use an image that's 200px by 200px to completely customize a 1x1 tile.

ui_config_shtlb.message: Show top left buttons only on area-hover

ui_config_shtlb_desc.message: When this option is checked, the top left buttons will slide out of the way. To access them again, simply mouse over where they normally are.

ui_config_amazonlocale.message: For the stock Amazon shortcut, select your country.

ui_config_reset_desc.message: This button will allow you to undo all changes you've made to Awesome New Tab Page.

ui_confirm_reset.message: Are you sure you want to reset widget, app, and custom shortcut placements, stock widget preferences (notepad, etc.), and background preferences? Any customizations will be irrevocably lost.

ui_config_bgimg1.message: Advanced (Shorthand Background CSS): Use an image on the web.

ui_config_bgimg3.message: Erase the box to use the default background (solid color).

ui_about_contrib_desc.message: This project wouldn't exist without the hard work, feedback, ideas, translations, and support of a few groups of some very awesome people.

ui_about_contrib_cta.message: Click the links above to see (and maybe join) these awesome people in action!

ui_about_share1.message: Do you like Awesome New Tab Page? Why not share it with friends and family?

ui_about_rate_desc.message: Do you like this extension? Take a minute to give a positive review on the Chrome Web Store.

ui_confirm_uninstall.message: Are you sure you want to uninstall $app$?

ui_faw_unlock_drag_apps.message: Unlock the grid and drag your installed apps to an empty slot.

ui_faw_unlock_drag_widgets.message: Unlock the grid and drag your installed widgets to an empty slot.

ui_faw_get_more_apps_body.message: Get more apps from the Chrome Web Store.

ui_faw_get_more_widgets_body.message: Get more widgets from the Chrome Web Store.

tutorial_1_desc1.message: A New Tab Page (NTP) replacement that doesn't suck.

tutorial_1_desc2.message: (... or at least tries really hard not to.)

tutorial_2_desc1.message: Icons are out-dated. Technology is pacing forward, with extremely powerful, dynamic, and beautiful widgets found in Android, Windows Phone 7, and (soon) Windows 8.

tutorial_2_desc2.message: This extension is a start at bringing the same power to Chrome's New Tab Page.

tutorial_3_desc1.message: Click unlock and move widgets and icons to wherever you want. Delete things you don't want (when they're unlocked).

tutorial_4_desc1.message: Don't worry, your apps haven't gone too far.

tutorial_4_desc2.message: Feel free to unlock tiles then drag apps to your home screen.

tutorial_4_desc3.message: Show what you regularly use, hide everything else.

tutorial_5_desc1.message: Enjoy! Remember to give this app 5 stars on the Web Store.

tutorial_5_desc2.message: Got an idea for this extension? Leave it here.

tutorial_5_desc3.message: Make your own widgets! Find out how here:

ui_shortcut_img.message: Image URL must be exactly 128px by 128px, preferably in PNG format with alpha transparency. To reset to default, just erase everything in the field.

notepad_default.message:
Type anything here. Everything you type will be saved on every keystroke.

Be careful though; there are NO backups, and the Reset button *DOES* reset this widget!

rctm_clear_all_confirm.message: Clearing the Recently Closed Tabs menu does not clear Chrome's browser history. This feature only clears this list.
